MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the SY16 postcode area of Newtown affecting a number properties in Adfa and the surrounding area. This is causing flickering power and reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:18PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because further investigations are required and our team are now working to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:37PM on 11th March 2021.
